proposal: Diving into the world of Peapods, where volatility isn't a foe but a friend that fills your wallet with PEAS. 🌱 Imagine turning market swings into a yield-earning fest, all while supporting the ecosystem's stability. With just 16 holders in the ETH network, it's like being part of an exclusive club, but why stop there? Our tools can help spread the word, grow your pod, and ensure everyone gets a bigger slice of the pie. Let's make volatility everyone's favorite dish! 🥧
